title: New: MARITZA – Dans Un Autre Regard
body: French was never my strong point at school, a fact that I’m sure my teacher would testify to. Hence I have no idea whatsoever about the subject matter of this new track from Montréal’s **MARITZA**, not that it really makes too much difference with music this downright beautiful. _Dans Un Autre Regard_ is a delicate acoustic-styled number, taking in influences such as **Feist** and **Regina Spektor**. The fact I have no idea what **MARITZA** is singing about actually adds to the level of intrigue and mystic; I can’t help but be enchanted. Dans un autre regard by MARITZA
